title: The Medical Services (Change of Duties and Titles) Act
title_en: The Medical Services (Change of Duties and Titles) Act
short_name: Medical Services (Change of Duties and Titles) Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-medical-services-change-of-duties-and-titles-act | Legal areas: Health and Safety

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Medical Services Shorttitle.
(Change of Duties and Titles) Act.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
